amendment.description: Amendment sought to provide for a one percent across the board cut to the discretionary spending levels in Division A of the bill.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 34 printed in Part B of House Report 115-711 to provide for a one percent across the board cut to the discretionary spending levels in Division A of the bill.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Blackburn amendment (A032) Failed by recorded vote: 155 - 262 (Roll no. 251).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A032) offered by Mrs. Blackburn.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Blackburn amendment (A032) Failed by recorded vote: 155 - 262 (Roll no. 251).
